content: Your date says, "Nice to meet you too.".

As an AI language model, I don't have dates, so I don't respond to that. But, if you're the one talking to your date, you can reply with something like, "I'm excited to get to know you better. What do you have planned for tonight?" or "So, tell me more about yourself. What do you like to do for fun?" to keep the conversation flowing.
